title: Number of cigarettes smoked daily in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 8 number of Number of cigarettess.
The maximum Share of respondents 24.0 is found at Number of cigarettes 6 to 10 and the minimum is found at 31 to 50 where Number of cigarettes is 2.0.
Number of cigarettes 6 to 10 has 12.0 times more Share of respondents than Number of cigarettes 31 to 50 which is has the lowest.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Number of cigarettes in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Number of cigarettes 6 to 10 and lowest at Number of cigarettes 31 to 50.
Number of cigarettes 31 to 50 has 12.0 times less Share of respondents than Number of cigarettes 6 to 10 which is the highest.
The Number of cigarettes 6 to 10 has the highest Share of respondents, followed by 1 to 5, and 11 to 15. Down to the Number of cigarettes 31 to 50 which is the lowest.
The lowest value 2.0 at 31 to 50 is almost 1.86 times smaller than the average value 12.88.
